Summary

With over 10 years of experience in data science, analytics management, and business intelligence, I have a proven track record of turning data into actionable insights that drive business growth. And with 3+ years of Project Management experience, I deliver this intelligence through the lense of a product. My expertise spans various industries, including SaaS, logistics, and retail, where I’ve successfully led cross-functional teams and managed impactful projects.

I specialize in both data science and digital analytics. My data science experience includes developing predictive models, optimizing data pipelines, and leveraging advanced analytics to drive strategic decisions. Concurrently, my work in digital analytics focuses on web analytics, enhancing customer retention, boosting marketing ROI, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

I am also passionate about mentoring and nurturing talent, helping others to achieve their full potential. My approach integrates deep technical expertise with a strong focus on people, making me a valuable asset to any data-driven organization.
